src_original: sarvasatvānām abhiruciradarśanatāyāṃ pariṇāmayāmi /  saumanasyadarśanatāyāṃ kalyāṇadarśanatāyāṃ pariṇāmayāmi /
sarvasattveṣu sarvarogavinivarttanāya pariṇāmayāmi /  sarvasattveṣv aparyantasthāmabalaśarīratāyāṃ pariṇāmayāmi /  sarvasatvānāṃ cakravāḍaparvatânavamardyakāyabalôpapattaye
anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvāḥ kalyāṇamitrâtyāgacittânutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtânupālanatayā /

evaṃ praṇidhānam utpādayati /  katham etāni kuśalamūlāni sarvajagadupajīvyāny upakāribhūtāni  bhaveyur viśuddhadharmaparyavasānāni yena sarvasatvānām  kuśalamūlair narakâpāyapratiprasrabdhir bhavati /  tairyagyonikayāmalaukikād duṣkhaskandhān nivarttayeyuḥ /
sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
anenâhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasatvānāṃ nayanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduṣkhaskandhavinivarttanāya /
sarvasatvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvakleśaparimocanatayā /  sarvasatvānāṃ śaraṇaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvabhayârakṣaṇatayā /
sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati /
sarvasatvānāṃ pradyoto bhaveyam  atyantaviśuddhipratiṣṭhāpanatayā /  sarvasatvānāṃ nāyako bhaveyam
anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān
teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādam abhedyaṃ pratilabheran /
teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike  dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ /
yathāśrutaṃ ca saṃdhārayeyuḥ /  sandhārayantaś ca pratipattyā saṃpādayeyuḥ /  tāṃś ca tathāgatān ārādhayeyuḥ /
mahatsu ca kuśalamūleṣv ātmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur atyantaṃ ca

iti hi bodhisatvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣv anyânyapudgaladigāgateṣv aprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu  bodhisatvaśravâgateṣu bodhisatvaśabdaṃ śrutvâgateṣu  bodhisatvapratyayâvakāśagateṣu bodhisatvadānapūrvaṃ praṇidhānaśruteṣu /  bodhisatvapraṇidhānacittanimantriteṣu /  sarvatyāgamanasâbhilaṣiteṣu
